overview: What happens when a legend of porn meets a young, beautiful starlet? Hot, lesbian sex, of course! In this extraordinary film from Sweetheart Video, some of the biggest adult industry icons show their young costars how to make love like a legend. Nina Hartley teaches young, blonde Samantha what is really takes to be a porn star, while Kelly Nichols contemplates a return to adult films - with a little help from nubile assistant Elexis Monroe. Kylie Ireland brings hot young Misty Stone to climax after climax, and the ageless Stephanie Swift teaches luscious Zoe Britton the finer points of Sapphic love.
title: Legends & Starlets
